Summary: Brilliant white sphere moving SW to NE, followed by much dimmer object.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Charlestown
There were no other sightings in Charlestown on or around July 6th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on the deck in the backyard watching the skies when I noticed a bright white star like object much brighter than the star Vega. It was moving silently from the SW to the NE and it had no other lights on it as would be normal for jets. It did not blink as it moved slowly across the sky. I thought it could have been a satellite but it was much too bright. It was however trailed by a much dimmer object which did appear to be a satellite. They moved together about a hands width apart at arms length. I watched it until it dissappeared over the horizon. Total sighting lasted approx. 3 minutes.
